entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow. Fog at times this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
